The first Index refers to looking straight down, while the final Index is looking straight up
POSITIONS: i = Forward and Back j = Left and Right k = Up and Down
In order to keep consistency, you should add/subtract the same number on all of the Indexes for your edits. EXAMPLE: To increase view distance, add 5 to every 'i' value in the camera track.
Generally you do not want to rotate the camera, but you can with the Orientation values.
